channel.title: Rune-Destiny The Glorious beginning
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PoLgbL6.png[/img]
website: http://rune-destiny.org Forums: http://rune-destiny.org/forum client: http://rune-destiny.org/forum/index.php?/forum/13-play-now/
Rune-Destiny is a highly advanced, well-established Runescape Private Server with a huge amount of flawless content . Online 24/7, hosted on a dedicated server, It will blow your mind with its amazing skilling, economy and PKing with over 20 minigames and bosses to defeat! It is a 748 revision server, which means it's probably a more recent and modern server than another RSPS you may have played. Players are rewarded daily for voting, and there are many donator benefits!
Uniqe Features
-Lottery System Lottery system you can participate on the lottery by opening the lottery ticket, you can get lottery ticket by Pvming will automaticaly put the ticket in your inventory. ticket is 100k when the system detects that there are 10 ticket is opened it will automaticaly randomly choose to all who participate.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oOq8vX9.jpg[/img]
-Pvm Points Pvm Points System ; every npc/monster or boss kill you will get 2 pvm points you can use that PVM points to buy cool stuff @ pvm shop/ commander montai @ home
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Hpw7RU3.jpg[/img]
-Challenge Everywhere ** This unique feature is designed for PKER u can challenge anyone and anywhere to PK with you. 70% done
*working on TriviaBot now (points system)
All features listed are working, 100% playable and live at the time of writing unless marked with a (*) in which case the marked features are partly working and still being actively developed, but are live and available for testing. Please note that some features are listed twice due to difficulty with categorization. We also have a lot of potential updates being tested that are not listed here.
General -Prestige System - Starter Packs - Loyalty Points (Auras) - Fist of Guthix Tokens (Pking Rewards) - Crystal Chest (Treasure Trail Items,Animal Masks,Mobilising Armies Robes) - Squeal of Fortune - Vote For Spins - Highscores - Friends List - Private Chat - Commands - 120/120 All skills - 169 Combat level - Hairdresser - Makeovers - Skill Capes - Special Attacks - Donator Zone - Max Cape - Completionist Cape - Own house Construction - Unique thieving system
and ALOT MORE!
Dungeons - Kuradals Dungeon - Jadinko Lair - Polypore Dungeon - Cave Horror Dungeon - Glacor's Dungeon - Ice Strykwyrms dungeon
Bosses - Bandos Godwars - Zamorak Godwars - Armadyl Godwars - Saradomin Godwars - King Black Dragon - Queen Black Dragon - Corporeal Beast - Tormented Demons - Nex - Barrows - Party Demon - Blink - Mercenary Mage - Bork - Sunsfreet - Donkeykong
and Many MORE!
[VIDEO]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PvxwgdhiMm8[/VIDEO]
Wanting to know more before you start? Then look no further! Just scroll down!
A fully featured well designed home to match your every need.
Our custom made home provides you with all the shops you'll ever need to start your adventure, and pave your way to greatness. You'll also find quick access to many other features of the server including a portal to your POH.
10+ Npcs with over 30 shops Quick access to your POH Prayer and Summoning Altars Fishing and other Skilling Areas All of your favorite minigames to play!
We have all of your favorite minigames that are easy to access and well rewarding. Some of these include (but are definitely not limited to):
- Wilderness (PKing) - Clan Wars ( White/Red/Purple portal) - Fight Caves (Fire Cape) - Barrows - Fight Kiln (Tokhaar-Kal) - Castle Wars - Dominion Tower - Runespan - Puro Puro - Artisans workshop - Zombie minigames - JAD
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QkFv94M.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yrZpKvS.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8PAJMo8.jpg[/img]
Sell your hard earned items for the price you want
Our Player-Owned-Shops give you the ability to sell what you want at your own price, isntead of selling it to the store for a fixed amount. Anyone can use them at any time. They can be accessed by other players when they right-click you.
Add your items and edit your price Change price at any time Lock your store so you dont get screwed Check original value to ensure you aren't being scammed
-Optimus Coder/Owner Rune-Destiny
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gQ89p5Y.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8PAJMo8.jpg[/img]

item.title: Rune-Destiny The Glorious beginning
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

-fix all possible glitch on new player choosing modes(dialogue gone if clicked other interfaces)
-hardcore/no-life modes are now getting 2pvm points per npc
-added more npc kills logs at Adventurers logs like a lot
-donor slayer increased exp
-fixed drygore longsword stats
-fixed offhand stats (chaotic rapier/longsword/xbow)
-fixed offhand drygs (longsword/rapier)
-added drygore mace and offhand, fixed stats
-fixed drygore mace animation

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Destiny The Glorious beginning
item.dc:creator: @rune-destiny rune-destiny
item.description:
@rune-destiny wrote:

[SIZE=5]Introducing! the New Prestige System![/SIZE]
[COLOR="#0000FF"] Since players complain about 120s to prestige, here’s the new offer for you guys![/COLOR]

Max prestige is now 100!
lvl 99 in all skills plus 120 dung, and you can now prestige!
You have the POWER to choose which resets do you want! (combat or all skills)
Will be adding more new stuffs for prestigers! Custom Weps with Custom Specs!
Offhands are on the way also!
+10 Permanent HP increase per Prestige Level!

What are you waiting for! compete now! be the first to get the Master Prestige Rank!

Read full topic

get started by speaking to the Boss Contract Manager!

New Homepage Added With NEW AND AWESOME LIVE CHAT supported 24/7 by the Staff.


Highscores Added
with compares system

item.description:

-updated thieving stalls for skillers, you get 1-2 damage, unless your more than lvl 3 combat
-fixed firemaking, can’t make fire above fire
-reduced granite exp mining
-reduced summoning exp gaining
-remove bigbones on father aereck
-increased spinning exp gain
-add new stuffs for runecrafting check to see it yourselves
-fixed withdraw from pouch with full inv = money lost
-fix money pouch dupe
-fixed ruby spec gives insane exp
-fixed giving extra exp even you hit a cap of 500 to a npc-added reflect damage to safespottable bosses
-disable dropping if tradebanned
-added droplogs
-added reflect damage to safespottable bosses
-disable dropping if tradebanned
-added droplogs

item.description:
@rune-destiny wrote:

Introducing the “Adventurers Logs” NPC added at home!

-can see others statistics (prestige,total donation etc)
-can see others drop logs
-can see others npc kill counts

-also added a damage when thieving(to prevent macroing)
-login limit = 1 no more dual client

item.title: Rune-Destiny The Glorious beginning
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

-enabled banking at player owned houses
-fixed battleaxe attack animation
-fixed gilded pickaxe not able to use when mining
-fixed herblore make all option
-fixed artisan make all option

-Introducing the New Livid Farming!
gain farming exp while bunching
gain farming,crafting,herblore exp while deposit at wagon
magical orb 100% working bought through livid points, can bunch 27 plants in no time! and an alternative for bucket so no need to have a bucket on your inv!

item.title: Rune-Destiny The Glorious beginning
item.dc:creator: @rune-destiny rune-destiny
item.description:
@rune-destiny wrote:

-fix hp of npcs
-added bank and blood altar at runecrafting
-fixed lootshare announcing wrong person at gaining rares
-prestige system is working 100%
-can use cape while prestiging, just dont remove it when you dont have the total lvl of 2496
-99 can get 2spins,120 can get 3 spins, 99all will give you 5spins,120 all will give you 10spins

Developer

83 posts
0 warning points
@Mention
Time Online: 9d 20h 1m 51s
-added more(friendly) slayer task and remove some unfriendly ones haha
-donator stuffs can now be traded to non-donors
-made donator flask noted
-added automatic rank update depends on total donations
-added new color code for lottery tix
-added logs so we can monitor some activities on the server.

-fixed some duel glitch issues(reworked whole duel system)
-disabled emotes @ pvp area
-added drops on revs
-added virtus wand on nex
-fix reported bug on onspot dueling
-fixed lootshare bug-added hween event!
-fixed weapon animation bug/glitch
-fixed mace skating glitch

Read full topic

30 shops? Sounds like you can just buy everything without having to try to achieve anything. I may be wrong but that sounds like a horrible idea if you ever want to build a real economy on your server.

item.title: Rune-Destiny The Glorious beginning
item.dc:creator: @rune-destiny rune-destiny
item.description:
@rune-destiny wrote:

Webiste: http://rune-destiny.org/

Wow! The server is really Growing Very Fast! 8th day and we now have 31 active players,
And now we are on top 10 on rune-script! over 170 votes for 8 days

Community having fun with some of the Executives playing,Pvming today
Community is becoming awesome, united no fighting,scamming nor raging
Come and join and become part of the Awesome Community

[B]Come join now![/B]
[I]A RSPS where we dont only Playto have fun but we also create friendship :)[/I]

[B][SIZE=5]17/10/14[/SIZE][/B]

Realesed of the newest and greatest boss ingame
[B]Vorago[/B]
Vorago is a gigantic, rocky, and extremely powerful boss monster c the “earth soul”, builled as the toughest boss monster in Rune-destiny

Located in a multi area so you can kill solo or team up with your friends and get one of the best weapon ingame “DRYGORE”

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Destiny The Glorious beginning
item.dc:creator: @rune-destiny rune-destiny
item.description:
@rune-destiny wrote:

added changing gender/outfit/hairstyle at accountmanager Button working 100%
-added more working slayer task, most of em are on the teles
-fixed donor shops for void gloves and shield not being available
-lottery Tix Added, 100pcs rocktails added @ pvm point shop
-some dialogues issues fixed(not being able to see prices due to dialogues arent closed after picking a certain shop)
-added “back” button to teleport dialogues
-perfected inferno adze effect, with 5% probability of burning logs, gives you firemaking and woodcutting exp at the same time!
-increased magic tree logs cutting rates
-120capes fixed, requirements now works.
-reworked how lottery works, can now be bought in genstore for 1.1m ea, entering lottery for 1m, winning pot is now 20m
-lottery ticket fixed atlast, players didn’t join lottery will not win anymore
-support rank/commands added
-mod/support yell fixed
-remove deathevent at QBD so you will not loose your gravestones/items when you die.
-added dialogue on dung gate when you die, so you can just g o to the gate and click to enter dung again

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Destiny The Glorious beginning
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

wimstr:

Nice work on the on-spot dueling.

Thank you!

updates logs

Visit us at http://rune-destiny.org/forum

Some minor fixes and addition
This updates are all suggestions posted on suggestionsand feedback on rune-destiny’s forums

Achievement a total of 54 registered players in 3rd day
altogh not all of them stayed but atleast half of them stay
Development Log:

Bought some advertisement stuff @ RSPSCoding
10/8/2014
added changing gender/outfit/hairstyle at accountmanager Button working 100%
-added more working slayer task, most of em are on the teles
-fixed donor shops for void gloves and shield not being available
-lottery Tix Added, 100pcs rocktails added @ pvm point shop
-some dialogues issues fixed(not being able to see prices due to dialogues arent closed after picking a certain shop)
-added “back” button to teleport dialogues

It’s a new public released server everyone so don’t be afraid to come check us out! We’re a Eco server building a great community. The advertisement speaks big, but if you want to really feel it, come join in for an hour and see how you like it here, you won’t regret it

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Destiny The Glorious beginning
item.dc:creator: @rune-destiny rune-destiny
item.description:
@rune-destiny wrote:

website: http://rune-destiny.org
Forums: http://rune-destiny.org/forum
client: http://rune-destiny.org/forum/index.php?/forum/13-play-now/

Rune-Destiny is a highly advanced, well-established Runescape Private Server with a huge amount of flawless content . Online 24/7, hosted on a dedicated server, It will blow your mind with its amazing skilling, economy and PKing with over 20 minigames and bosses to defeat! It is a 748 revision server, which means it’s probably a more recent and modern server than another RSPS you may have played. Players are rewarded daily for voting, and there are many donator benefits!

Uniqe Features

-Lottery System
Lottery system you can participate on the lottery by opening the lottery ticket, you can get lottery ticket by Pvming will automaticaly put the ticket in your inventory. ticket is 100k when the system detects that there are 10 ticket is opened it will automaticaly randomly choose to all who participate.

-Pvm Points
Pvm Points System ; every npc/monster or boss kill you will get 2 pvm points
you can use that PVM points to buy cool stuff @ pvm shop/ commander montai @ home

-Challenge Everywhere **
This unique feature is designed for PKER u can challenge anyone and anywhere to PK with you.
70% done

*working on TriviaBot now (points system)

All features listed are working, 100% playable and live at the time of writing unless marked with a (*) in which case the marked features are partly working and still being actively developed, but are live and available for testing. Please note that some features are listed twice due to difficulty with categorization. We also have a lot of potential updates being tested that are not listed here.

General
-Prestige System

  • Starter Packs
  • Loyalty Points (Auras)
  • Fist of Guthix Tokens (Pking Rewards)
  • Crystal Chest (Treasure Trail Items,Animal Masks,Mobilising Armies Robes)
  • Squeal of Fortune
  • Vote For Spins
  • Highscores
  • Friends List
  • Private Chat
  • Commands
  • 120/120 All skills
  • 169 Combat level
  • Hairdresser
  • Makeovers
  • Skill Capes
  • Special Attacks
  • Donator Zone
  • Max Cape
  • Completionist Cape
  • Own house Construction
  • Unique thieving system

and ALOT MORE!

Dungeons

  • Kuradals Dungeon
  • Jadinko Lair
  • Polypore Dungeon
  • Cave Horror Dungeon
  • Glacor’s Dungeon
  • Ice Strykwyrms dungeon

Bosses

  • Bandos Godwars
  • Zamorak Godwars
  • Armadyl Godwars
  • Saradomin Godwars
  • King Black Dragon
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • Corporeal Beast
  • Tormented Demons
  • Nex
  • Barrows
  • Party Demon
  • Blink
  • Mercenary Mage
  • Bork
  • Sunsfreet
  • Donkeykong

and Many MORE!

[VIDEO]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PvxwgdhiMm8[/VIDEO]

Wanting to know more before you start?
Then look no further! Just scroll down!

A fully featured well designed home to match your every need.

Our custom made home provides you with all the shops you’ll ever need to start your adventure, and pave your way to greatness. You’ll also find quick access to many other features of the server including a portal to your POH.

10+ Npcs with over 30 shops
Quick access to your POH
Prayer and Summoning Altars
Fishing and other Skilling Areas
All of your favorite minigames to play!

We have all of your favorite minigames that are easy to access and well rewarding. Some of these include (but are definitely not limited to):

  • Wilderness (PKing)
  • Clan Wars ( White/Red/Purple portal)
  • Fight Caves (Fire Cape)
  • Barrows
  • Fight Kiln (Tokhaar-Kal)
  • Castle Wars
  • Dominion Tower
  • Runespan
  • Puro Puro
  • Artisans workshop
  • Zombie minigames
  • JAD



Sell your hard earned items for the price you want

Our Player-Owned-Shops give you the ability to sell what you want at your own price, isntead of selling it to the store for a fixed amount. Anyone can use them at any time. They can be accessed by other players when they right-click you.

Add your items and edit your price
Change price at any time
Lock your store so you dont get screwed
Check original value to ensure you aren’t being scammed

-Optimus
Coder/Owner Rune-Destiny


Read full topic
